review:
I was very unsure about the treatment as it was multiple cavities and cannot be cure in one seating. She has look in detail and given the detailed suggestions time to time during the treatment. ** ** ***** **** *** *** ******** **** ***** *** *** **** her right advice during the treatment helped to take inform decisions. 
I had not felt a pain in any seating and she did proper precautions while dealing with tooth and cavities.  I would like to recommend her for dental advise and treatments. 
Matunga Seva mandal has very supportive staff and the treatment is quite reasonable. Wish to keep the good work going for the management team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Periodontal Flap Surgery,Dental Surgery,Dental Implant,
review: I've recently started going to Dr. Gvalani for a full overhaul of my front teeth and her work has been absolutely outstanding. She's knowledgeable, trustworthy and answered my numerous questions in detail, politely and patiently. To add to it this has been one of the most painless experiences I've ever had. Her expertise, integrity and empathy for the person on the other end of drill is much appreciated.

The clinic is well lit, spacious and clean. The doctor is professional and precise in her work. In addition to the procedure done she recommended some preventive remedies which, once habituated to have given me considerable relief. All in all a good professional resulting a great experience, which usually isn't the case while visiting a dentist.
Dr Akshi has a gentle hand and is extremely good at what she does. She explained the entire process to me and was very patient and thorough.
Good. Gave constructive suggestions.Was thorough in her checkup.Did not suggest things that were unnecessary and expensive.
Very attentive and patiently solved my problem. I would recommend her to other friends.The clinic can be depended upon
